metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18641 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In LXC 2.0, many template scripts download code over cleartext HTTP, and omit a digital-signature check, before running it to bootstrap containers.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> in lxc 3.0, the old templates were split out into the lxc-templates package and distrobuilder is now used instead. https://github.com/lxc/lxc/commit/aafb5ea2a849056f9866359996605af0290605bd  as of 2020-05-13, no complete fix for the issues are available

criterions.comment: lxc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.4-0ubuntu2').
lxc-templates package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
